resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158056</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158056</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2791</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Classroom Court</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassenzimmer-Gericht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cour de Salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corte Da Sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corte Dell'Aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικαστήριο τάξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corte De la Sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment, for an activity where students listen to a dialogue of an argument, decide who is right and suggest a solution, by answering questions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung, 
für eine Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer zu einem Dialog eines 
Arguments hören, wem Recht ist und eine Lösung vorschlägt, indem 
sie antwortet, fragt entscheiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation, 
pour une activité où les étudiants écoutent un dialogue d'un 
argument, décident qui est juste et suggère une solution, par la 
réponse interroge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação,
para uma atividade onde os estudantes escutem um diálogo de um 
argumento, decide-se quem seja direita e sugira uma solução, 
respondendo questiona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione, 
per un'attività dove gli allievi ascoltano un dialogo di un 
argomento, decide chi è destra e suggerisce una soluzione, 
rispondendo interroga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση, για μια 
δραστηριότητα όπου οι σπουδαστές ακούνε ένα διαλογικό παράθυρο 
ενός ορίσματος, αποφασίζει ποιος είναι σωστός και προτείνει μια 
λύση, με την απάντηση των ερωτήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen, 
para una actividad donde los estudiantes escuchan un diálogo de un 
argumento, decide a quién correcto y sugiere una solución, 
contestando pregunta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
